channel.title: general on trexCode
channel.description: Recent content in general on trexCode

item.title: This is for you
item.description:
Hello everyone, my name is Daniel Lopez, hereafter trexCode. I have decided to start this small space that I had in mind for too long but for one thing and another I always kept it aside.

In the workplace I have been developing in Java for more than 5 years, I started with a bit of mobile development for more than a year, from then on everything has been web. During all this time I have learned many things that I would like to share with you, hoping that they may be useful to you at some point. I will try to stay active through this medium regardless of the impact it has, since in addition to being able to serve you, it helps me a lot to not forget those concepts that fail us so much. Te deseo lo mejor en todo lo que emprendas y espero poder colaborar en tu formaci√≥n.

Regards, trexCode.
